sentence: According to critics of Florida Governor Ron DeSantis' administration, the Sunshine State's rejection of 42 math textbooks that had been approved for use in public schools is one example among many of conservatives attacking straw men.

title: Attack on Florida's Scrutiny of Textbooks is More CRT Gaslighting | Opinion
